backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, payments with multi-currency support, access control, and platform connector storage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark mode variables for the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global toaster for the React app.
Authenticated user dropdown showing profile info and sign‑out with cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/brand/ShanjuLogo: Shanju logo component with fallback initials when the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/integrations/Con: Form for creating platform connectors with validation, submission, and toast feedback.
Table listing connectors with platform labels and delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the sticky top header with logo, app title, and authentication status.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with auth-protected routes, header, navigation bar, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/payments/CreditC: Implements a credit card payment form with validation, formatted inputs, and simulated processing.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Displays detailed payment info with status, role, link sharing, and status update actions.
Form for creating a new payment request with validation and backend submission.
Allows the user to choose between card or PayPal as the payment method.
Displays a payments list with filtering, role detection, loading/error states, and navigation actions.
Shows a styled badge indicating the current payment status.
frontend/src/components/payments/PayPalB: Provides a PayPal payment UI that simulates redirect and processing before triggering success.
frontend/src/components/payments/SimpleC: Renders a basic CAPTCHA generator and validator to confirm human input before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal that collects and saves a user's name during initial profile setup using a form.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectors.ts: Provides hooks to list, fetch, create, update, and delete platform connector records via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentPrincipal.t: Returns the authenticated user's principal or null if unauthenticated or anonymous.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayments.ts: Hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating payments using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and a warm theme palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePaymentPage.tsx: Renders a page with a header and the PaymentForm to create a new payment request.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays payment stats, a create button, and a table of payments using fetched payment data.
frontend/src/pages/IntegrationsPage.tsx: Provides UI to add new commerce integrations and manage existing connectors.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a 404 message with a button navigating users back to sign‑in or the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentDetailsPage.ts: Loads a payment by index, showing its details or fallback states such as loading or not found.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentHistoryPage.ts: Shows a simple page header and the full payments table for history viewing.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPaymentPage.tsx: Public-facing payment flow that verifies captcha, selects methods, and processes payments with status handling.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login, displays errors, and triggers profile setup or redirects to the dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats bigint currency amounts using Intl.NumberFormat with a fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Custom Tailwind configuration defining colors, fonts, themes, and animations with plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state including schema version, architectural plans, existing features, and requirements for the Shanju payment provider app. Captures integrations, multi‑currency, hosted checkout, and connector management details.
